description:
The hero Crow was the strongest hero who defeated the Demon King.

However, when he overworked his body to the limit in the battle against the Demon King, he injured his back and has been suffering from severe back pain ever since.

Crow was then expelled from the heroic party and the kingdom.

He was unable to walk due to his back pain, and finally collapsed in the forest.

But then Alice Bell, a beautiful elf who has a reputation for being a great physical therapist in the neighborhood, appears in front of him!

This is the first time that I’ve ever seen such a thing.

You’ll be able to get a lot more than that.　What are you doing all of a sudden?

“Can you stand up now?

A new kind of “back pain fantasy” for all those with back pain!

If you have back pain, you’ll surely be able to relate to the depth of the protagonist’s gratitude for being healed!

If you have back pain, you’ll be able to relate to the depth of the protagonist’s gratitude for being cured!

(Note: This is a story that can be enjoyed by those who do not have back pain.) This is a tale of saving the world for the second time, starting with an old-fashioned real hero who helps the weak and saves the world, but is banished due to back pain.

This is the second world salvation story that begins when a real hero is banished due to back pain.>
